title: We Need To Talk About So Called Cases of “Sudden Death”…
cleaned_text:
A 24 year old reporter for global news has “died suddenly” at his home raising serious questions about the cause of death considering the young man was fully vaccinated with up to date boosters as well…

Meanwhile Pierre Poilievre is now the official controlled opposition to the Trudeau regime but if he becomes Prime Minister, what would that mean for potential vaccine mandates in the future?

In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth covers the latest Covid-19(84) news while also warning about falling victim to the Canadian false left right paradigm in politics.

If you appreciate my efforts please consider making a contribution here:

Or you can send an e-transfer to dan@pressfortruth.ca

If you’re old fashioned like we are and prefer to keep it old school, we also accept cash, cheques, equipment and words of encouragement! You can send us those things here:
